Class LevelSelectScreen

java.lang.Object
pacman.LevelSelectScreen
public class LevelSelectScreen extends Object
Screen for selecting and managing game levels. Provides functionality to: - Select and play existing levels - Import custom levels - Create new levels - Delete existing levels
Author:
Danilo Spera

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelSelectScreen

      public LevelSelectScreen()
      Creates a new LevelSelectScreen instance.

  • Method Details

    • setLevelSelectedCallback

      public void setLevelSelectedCallback(Consumer<String> callback)
      Sets the callback function for level selection. This callback is triggered when a user double-clicks a level.
      Parameters:
      callback - Function to execute when a level is selected

    • show

      public void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Displays the level selection interface. Shows a list of available levels and management buttons.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The main application window
